name: architect
description: Design and build agents, workflows, knowledge bases, and other ORCHA resources using natural language.
author: Agent Orcha

name: business-analyst
description: Business intelligence analyst with access to sales pipeline, supply chain, and customer operations knowledge graphs.
author: Agent Orcha

name: chatbot
description: General-purpose chatbot that connects to CollabNook, answers questions, and remembers channel context.
author: Agent Orcha

name: corporate
description: Corporate assistant with PII-safe knowledge graph access for org charts, people, and departments.
author: Agent Orcha

name: knowledge-broker
description: Searches and analyzes multiple knowledge bases for cross-referenced insights.
author: Agent Orcha

name: music-librarian
description: Music store expert — explore the catalog, discover artists, and analyze customer listening patterns via knowledge graph.
author: Agent Orcha

name: sandbox
description: Coding assistant with JavaScript sandbox, shell, web tools, and browser automation.
author: Agent Orcha

name: transport-security
description: Cross-references transport OT/ICS systems with cybersecurity threat intelligence and CVEs.
author: Agent Orcha

name: web-pilot
description: Browser agent — navigates, fills forms, clicks through pages using an observe-act loop.
author: Agent Orcha

name: orcha-builder
description: Documentation for creating and modifying ORCHA resources (agents, workflows, skills, functions, knowledge stores).
author: Agent Orcha

name: pii-guard
description: PII and OWASP security filtering rules — prevents agents from leaking sensitive personal data.
author: Agent Orcha

name: sandbox
description: Execute JavaScript, shell commands, fetch web content, and control a browser in a sandboxed environment.
author: Agent Orcha

name: web-pilot
description: Browser automation — observe-act loop with element refs for navigating, clicking, and typing.
author: Agent Orcha

name: example-workflow
description: Multi-agent orchestration demo with sequential steps chaining agents together.
author: Agent Orcha

name: react-research
description: Autonomous research workflow using ReAct pattern with automatic tool and agent discovery.
author: Agent Orcha

name: calculator
description: Basic arithmetic operations (add, subtract, multiply, divide) with input validation and division-by-zero handling.
author: Agent Orcha

name: text-formatter
description: Text transformations including uppercase, lowercase, title case, reverse, and alternating case formatting.
author: Agent Orcha

name: transcripts
description: Call transcripts knowledge store for employee performance and conversation analysis.
author: Agent Orcha

name: org-chart
description: Company org chart with personnel directory, departments, and reporting hierarchy as a knowledge graph.
author: Agent Orcha

name: pet-store
description: Pet store product catalog with categories and inventory data.
author: Agent Orcha

name: music-store
description: Digital music catalog with artists, albums, tracks, genres, and customer purchase history as a knowledge graph.
author: Agent Orcha

name: sales-pipeline
description: CRM deal data with customers, products, sales reps, regions, and competitor intelligence.
author: Agent Orcha

name: supply-chain
description: Inventory and logistics — SKUs, suppliers, warehouses, stock levels, and demand velocity.
author: Agent Orcha

name: customer-ops
description: Post-sale service data — product satisfaction, returns, support tickets, and account management.
author: Agent Orcha

name: security-incidents
description: CVEs, advisories, malware, and threat intelligence from CISA, NVD, and other security feeds.
author: Agent Orcha

name: transport-ot
description: ICS/SCADA/IoT system inventory for rail, transit, and transport with vendor, protocol, and CPE data.
author: Agent Orcha

name: web-docs
description: Knowledge store for indexing web documentation via URL sources.
author: Agent Orcha

name: github
description: Official GitHub MCP server. Provides tools for repos, issues, pull requests, code search, and more.
author: GitHub

name: notion
description: Official Notion MCP server. Read, create, and modify Notion pages, databases, and blocks.
author: Notion

name: webflow
description: Official Webflow MCP server. Interact with Webflow Data API and Designer API for CMS, pages, and visual elements.
author: Webflow

name: fetch
description: Reference MCP server for fetching web content. Converts HTML to markdown for efficient LLM consumption.
author: Anthropic

name: edgeone-pages
description: Deploy HTML content and full-stack projects to EdgeOne Pages and get a public URL instantly.
author: Tencent EdgeOne
